pdmed_ldopa.Description: Total daily dose of Levodopa (Sinement, madapar) in milligrams

pdmed_ldopa_duo.Description: Total daily dose of Levodopa infusion (Duodopa) in milligrams

pdmed_maob_resag.Description: Total daily dose of Resagaline (MAO-B inhibitor) in milligrams

pdmed_comt_multiplier.Description: No COMT = 1, otherwise use the following multiplier on total levodopa dose: [pdmed_comt_ent]=1.33,[pdmed_comt_tol]=1.5,[pdmed_comt_opi]=1.5
